description: This table contains information about reportable case abstractions.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: CASE_RPT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The report type category ID for the reportable case abstraction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Non STD


STD

columns.name: CASE_RPT_COND_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the associated reportable condition (HFR) record. This column is frequently used to link to the REGISTRY_CONFIG table.

columns.name: CASE_RPT_COND_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the registry record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the associated patient (EPT) record. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: CASE_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case note associated with the reportable case abstraction.

columns.name: HOSPITAL_CENSUS_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant of the hospital census in UTC if the Hospital Census batch created this abstraction row.

columns.name: HOSPITAL_CENSUS_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant of the hospital census in local time if the Hospital Census batch created this abstraction.

columns.name: ASSOC_RFV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the reason for visit associated with the reportable case abstraction.
